q: The singer, who assists Simon Cowell on The X Factor, tweeted last night:`` Coming out now.'' Sinitta then received messages from her followers to congratulate her on the admission. One wrote: Welcome to the pink side! We have cupcakes! However, the star later revealed that the tweet was instead intended to be a text message for her personal chauffeur, Gemel. Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters.( See photos of Egypt convulsed by protest.) I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
